io.name: SCISAHHE0090101_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SCISAHHE0090101_inbound" /> <complexType name="SCISAHHE0090101_inbound"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="srchGroup" type="tns:SRCH_GROUP_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>검색그룹</documentation> <appinfo> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SRCH_GROUP_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="strtYm"> <annotation> <documentation>시작년월</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="endYm"> <annotation> <documentation>종료년월</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="nxtSrchKey"> <annotation> <documentation>다음검색KEY</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
